document.full_text: a taco bell drive-through customer who became enraged because of a price increase on beefy crunch burritos fired a bb gun through the window at a manager on sunday, police said.
document.title: taco rage: man upset at burrito price rise fires shots
lines_and_colors: a taco bell drive-through customer who became enraged because of a price increase on beefy crunch burritos fired a bb gun through the window at a manager on sunday, police said.
